channel.title: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
channel.description: Im not a genius coder, I only know HTML, CSS, and I dabble in java lol. So how hard would it be to make one?

item.title: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

It’s not very hard to make an MMO, Unless you wanted it to be good.
A spamming game would take like 15 mins to make

Read full topic
item.source: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?

item.title: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

Here’s an MMO I’m working on w/ my friend, not much multi player yet however. http://sourmud.jwarez.net/

Read full topic
item.source: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?

item.title: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
item.dc:creator: @Speakerboxxx Speakerboxxx
item.description:
@Speakerboxxx wrote:

[quote=“nade, post:8, topic:138758”][quote author=Speakerboxxx link=topic=190701.msg1718631#msg1718631 date=1188573159]
First of all you should learn a programming language, wether it’s Java, C++, …
After you’ve learned that you should search for some tutorials on how to create a MMO.

Once you did those 2 things it would be just a matter of time until you complete it.
[/quote]

Why do you even post?[/quote]
Because im trying to look like a cool nerd who knows everything about programming

Read full topic
item.source: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?

item.title: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Yea. He used Blitz3D to program it, if I remember correctly.
He had one that owned, but I never saw what became of it. I only saw screenshots of it, but it looked pretty good. The name started with an A…I think…

Read full topic
item.source: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?

item.title: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:10, topic:138758”]Try asking JME. He had about 2 MMO projects going, but he ‘took a break’ in the middle of one, and the other one, well I don’t even know what happened to that.

It is alot of work. If you plan on doing it alone, prepare for a 2-3 year voyage. And expect to take breaks. I guarentee you will want to quit at least once every month :P[/quote]Wtf I didn’t know jme could program.

Read full topic
item.source: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?

item.title: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

Try asking JME. He had about 2 MMO projects going, but he ‘took a break’ in the middle of one, and the other one, well I don’t even know what happened to that.

It is alot of work. If you plan on doing it alone, prepare for a 2-3 year voyage. And expect to take breaks. I guarentee you will want to quit at least once every month

Read full topic
item.source: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?

After you’ve learned that you should search for some tutorials on how to create a MMO.

Once you did those 2 things it would be just a matter of time until you complete it.

Why do you even post?[/quote]

item.title: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“Cunit, post:4, topic:138758”][quote author=1337h4x link=topic=190701.msg1717612#msg1717612 date=1188536727]

Very hard to make a sucsessful one and btw Games like runescape take lots of time not saying weeks or months like years to become very good and intertaining

learn everything to know about java
Make a good C++ then try to make one
[/quote]Not very hard. If you know what you’re doing it’s pretty easy actually. I suggest you make simple games first though and learn the language.

well he said that he wasn’t that familiar with Java so i would assume for him hard[/quote]Well I assume that he can learn it.

Read full topic
item.source: How hard would it be to make your own MMO?
